About Me

Hi there! I'm currently a senior majoring in Computer Science at UC Santa Barbara. I'm from San Francisco, California & I love finding the best places to eat wherever I go, especially ice cream üç¶

I am also passionate about empowering others to learn CS, so my peers and I started Womxn/Hacks, an all female-identifying hackathon at UCSB last year! This year, I was honored to receive a scholarship to attend the Grace Hopper Conference 2019 through my university. Since it will be my first time attending the conference, I am super excited to go (‚ú®!!!) and would love to connect with you if you're attending too!

This summer, I interned with Citi in a cloud engineering operations team and learned a lot of interesting software in Texas (yeehaw). I learned that there are a myriad of different technologies used in cloud engineering and I would love to work in a cloud based team in the future.
